name: ecommerce-order-tracking-system-master
description:
The order tracking system allows the customer to gain insight into where their order is at any given point in time. From the time an order is placed until it is delivered. That means an order tracking system needs to be able to follow and provide insight into the status of the order through its entire journey in the Google map to the customer until it reaches to customer door.

Why this system is necessary?

  • Make e-commerce business more efficient.
  • Increase customers experiences and satisfactions with below questionnaires.
  • Has customerâ€™s order been filled? I.e., is it picked, packed and ready to ship?
  • Is the order correct?
  • Are any items missing or are there problems with my order?
  • Is my order still in the warehouse?
  • Has my order been picked up for delivery?
  • Where is the order right now?
  • When will it be delivered?

Built with followig technologies

  • Express
  • Passport
  • MongoDB
  • Google map JavaScript API
